title: Instructional Design Practical Skills Enhancement: Advanced Medical Communication Simulation Training: Virtual Patient-Based

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in medical/linguistic pathology and clinical communication experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate complex communication disorder cases with 85% or higher accuracy in a virtual patient simulation environment.
Learners apply at least three advanced communication strategies to real-world clinical scenarios through project-based assignments.
Learners achieve an average score of 3.5 or higher on a 4-point scale for simulated patient response capabilities in summative assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
